sequence:
A Glorious Interlude

<size=45>Chapter 6 - The Glory She's Named For Pt. 1</size>

scripts.say: Haah... Now that that's done with...
We had reached about the halfway point when an exhausted Glorious leaned against a huge rig to catch her breath.

options.content: Thanks for your hard work, Glorious.
Wordlessly offer her a cup of coolant.

scripts.say: Th-thank you! Sorry I'm not being very helpful...
Huh? Are you trying to tell me you think you should have asked more people to help?
You can't do that! Everyone's busy preparing for battle. That's so much more important!
In fact, I didn't even want Ardent or Acasta coming to help. Not that they listen to me...
Of course, I'm not forcing anything...
I seem tired to you? Hm... Well, what can I say...?
As the Royal Navy's Glorious aircraft carrier, the one everyone has come to rely on, such is my burden to bear, is it not?!
Glorious was doing everything she could to put on a brave face. But—
Aye! Glorious, awaiting orders, Commander! Without hesitation, I execute your will!
“Stop fronting”...? That's... an order, Commander? ... But...
... I've always been so clumsy, I'm totally useless in battle, it's all I can do to make sure I'm not holding everyone else back!
But if that's an order, Commander... Then...!
